main event: An observer reported seeing an object resembling an aircraft circling at high altitude over Piqua, Ohio.
interesting points: The object showed no vapor trail during its observation., The observer concluded it looked like an airplane., The sighting lasted about 20 minutes., The object appeared brighter than the background of the sky., The estimated size of the object was 12 to 15 feet.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object resembling an aircraft
witness description: A phone operator with 35 years of service in the Air Force Civil Service.
